Class DebugShell

java.lang.Object
microsim.ui.DebugShell
public class DebugShell extends Object
Handles the shell shown in debug mode. Debug information is shown in 2 ways:
  1. Via the log(java.lang.String) method, which prints information mid-cycle.
  2. Via the shell(microsim.simulation.Simulation) method, which offers interactive debugging at the end of cycles.

    • shell

      public static void shell(Simulation which)
      Displays a debug shell for the current simulation instance. The shell offers the following commands:
      • step: steps execution by 1 cycle.
      • quit: halts execution and quits.
      • proc: offers processor information with following options:
        • registers: prints all registers-
        • state prints state information-
      • mem: offers memory information with following options:
        • read: reads memory at address.
      Parameters:
      which - the simulation instance that called the shell
